Summary

I am a passionate about making the front-end semantic and understandable. I love to build new applications and fiddling with any new technology out there.

Work Experience

2012 – Present

Curator of Mark My Word

Founded Mark My Word Conference which is India's First Content & Design Conference.

Front-end Lead at Web Mutiny

Working as the front-end lead with Web Mutiny. My work is majorly concentrated in building websites which have a strong foundation.
2011

Intern at National Institute of Hydrology, Roorkee

Worked in Remote Sensing & GIS Laboratory and learnt how to use different GIS software. Along with this, I also worked on a project on "Web GIS and Its Applications in Water Resource Systems".

Developer at TEDxBITSGoa 2012

Built the website for TEDxBITSGoa 2012. Using WordPress as a platform, the website for the conference was built with the help of Bones as a framework, I made a new theme for it which used custom loops and custom pages.
2010

Summer Intern at Logicsoft International Private Limited

Worked as a summer intern learning and working with ASP .NET
